name: cbvalvw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wal(s1, wn(w0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wal(s1, wn(w0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wal(s1, wn(w0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wal(s1, wn(w0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wal(s1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wn(w0), wal(s1, wn(w0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s0, wal(s1, w1))

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s0, wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s0, wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s0, wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s0, wal(s1, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, wn(w0))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Change bound variable. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. See ~ cbvalv for a version with fewer disjoint variable conditions but requiring more axioms. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2017.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 28-Feb-2018.)
